title: Virgin Voyages launches half price deposits on Scarlet Lady cruise holidays
text:

Virgin Voyages is giving cruise passengers - or as it calls them, sailors - the perfect chance to secure cruise holidays next year without needing to blow your pre-Christmas budget.

That's because Sir Richard Branson 's cruise line has just slashed prices on its deposits by half price, meaning you could bag a spot on its glamorous 2020 itineraries from £110pp.

You can then spread the cost of your holiday although it's worth noting that the full balance is due 120 days prior to your voyage start date).

You can already book the cruises with half price deposits on the Virgin Voyages website , but to make use of the offer you'll need to book by the 30th November, when the sale ends.

Prices for the cruises start from £675pp for four-night sailings, and from £1,800pp for seven-night sailings, all based on return journeys from Miami.

Virgin Voyages will debut its first cruise ship Scarlet Lady in April 2020, with some very glamorous itineraries to the Caribbean including the brand's own Bahamas beach club, Bimini.

(Image: Virgin Voyages)

It won't be a traditional cruise experience; the ship will boast vegan menus, drag-inspired brunches , rockstar-themed suites , and even an onboard tattoo parlour .

Other highlights include a 220 square foot area of triple netting where guests can lay out and soak up the rays, right above the ocean and the decks below and cosy cabanas where you can take in ocean views.

No surprise then that it's one of the most highly-anticipated new cruise ships for 2020 !

The best part is, the half price deposits aren't the only offer on at the moment.

If you book a cruise holiday in April or May 2020, then you'll also receive a bottle of Moët & Chandon Impérial courtesy of the cruise line.

You can find out more and read the full terms and conditions on the Virgin Voyages website .
description: Virgin Voyages is currently offering half price deposits on Scarlet Lady sailings and there are very glamorous itineraries on offer
